New Records: Evin Lewis scored his fifth ODI century off 61 balls.
Key Match Events: Evin Lewis' unbeaten 102 steered West Indies to a consolation victory.
Sherfane Rutherford celebrated his fifty runs.
Dilshan Madushanka celebrated the wicket of West Indies' Captain Shai Hope.
Asitha Fernando celebrated the wicket of West Indies' Brandon King.
Pathum Nissanka celebrated his fifty runs.
Roston Chase celebrated the wicket of Sri Lanka's Avishka Fernando.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was reduced to 23 overs per side due to a five-hour rain delay.
